label: A_hP1_191_a-001
title: Simple Hexagonal (HgSn$_{6-10}$ $A_{f}$) Structure
comments: Unlike the simple cubic lattice, there are no elements which take this structure as the ground state. There is a metastable silicon phase with this structure. The prototype state is a mercury-tin alloy. Thus the atom type ``M'' represents an average of Hg and Sn atoms.
